en: Peppa and George are very excited today.
zh: 佩奇和乔治今天非常兴奋。

en: It is snowing outside!
zh: 因为外面下雪了！

en: Mummy! Can we go and play in the snow?
zh: 妈妈，我们可以去玩雪吗？

en: Yes, but it's very cold outside,so you must wrap up warm.
zh: 可以，但是外面非常冷，所以你们必须穿暖和些。

en: Hurray!
zh: 好啊！

en: And don't forget to wear your hats,and scarves and gloves.
zh: 还有不要忘记戴上你们的帽子，围巾和手套。

en: It is very cold outside.
zh: 外面天气非常冷。

en: Peppa and George must wear their hats and scarves and gloves.
zh: 佩奇和乔治必须戴上他们的帽子围巾和手套。

en: Come on, George!
zh: 快来，乔治！

en: Peppa and George are making footprints in the snow.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在雪地里踩脚印。

en: Oops!
zh: 喔！

en: Oh, dear！
zh: 哦，糟糕！

en: It's not funny!
zh: 这一点也不好笑！

en: George, let's play snowballs!
zh: 乔治，让我们来打雪仗吧！

en: Peppa has made a snowball.
zh: 佩奇做了个雪球。

en: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun.
zh: 佩奇和乔治玩得很开心。

en: George, come back, you little piggy!
zh: 乔治，快回来，你这小猪！

en: Arrgh!
zh: 啊！

en: Oh, dear. Maybe this game is getting a little too rough.
zh: 哦，糟糕。也许这游戏玩得有点过火了。

en: Sorry, George.
zh: 对不起，乔治。

en: George! Let's build a snowman!
zh: 乔治！让我们来堆雪人吧！

en: Peppa and George are making a snowman.
zh: 佩奇和乔治在堆雪人。

en: First, they make the body.
zh: 首先，他们堆了身体。

en: George, this is the snowman's body.
zh: 乔治，这是雪人的身体了。

en: Now, they make the snowman's head.
zh: 现在，他们在堆雪人的头。

en: Now, he needs arms and eyes and a mouth!
zh: 现在，他需要胳膊，眼睛和嘴巴！

en: George has found some sticks for the snowman's arms.
zh: 乔治找了几根树枝来做雪人的胳膊。

en: Peppa has found some stones for the snowman's eyes and mouth.
zh: 佩奇找了几块石头来做雪人的眼睛和嘴巴。

en: This is his face.
zh: 这是他的脸啦。

en: Now the snowman needs a nose.
zh: 现在雪人需要一个鼻子。

en: Peppa has got a carrot, to make the snowman's nose.
zh: 佩奇找了根胡萝卜来做雪人的鼻子。

en: The snowman looks very happy.
zh: 雪人看上去很开心。

en: But maybe he is bit cold.
zh: 但也许他有点冷。

en: The snowman needs some clothes to keep him warm.
zh: 雪人需要穿些衣服来保暖。

en: George has found some clothes to keep the snowman nice and warm!
zh: 乔治找来了一些衣服来给雪人保暖！

en: The snowman is wearing his hat and scarf and gloves.
zh: 雪人戴上了他的帽子围巾和手套。

en: Mummy! Daddy! Come and look!
zh: 妈妈！爸爸！快来看看！

en: Mummy Pig is wearing her hat and scarf and gloves.
zh: 妈妈戴着她的帽子，围巾和手套来了。

en: That is the best snowman I have ever seen!
zh: 这是我见过的最好的雪人了！

en: Daddy Pig looks quite cold.
zh: 猪爸爸看上去有点冷。

en: He isn't wearing his hat and scarf and gloves.
zh: 他没有戴着他的帽子，围巾和手套。

en: Daddy, why aren't you wearing your hat and scarf and gloves?
zh: 爸爸，你为什么不戴上你的帽子，围巾和手套？

en: I don't know where they are!
zh: 我不知道他们跑哪去了！

en: I can't find them anywhere.
zh: 我到处都找不到它们。

en: I think I know where Daddy's hat, scarf and gloves are
zh: 我想我知道爸爸的帽子，围巾和手套在哪了

en: Daddy Pig's hat and scarf and gloves are on the snowman!
zh: 猪爸爸的帽子，围巾和手套都在雪人身上！
